entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
